talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You are... Hmm, yes... You are burdened
with a mission of monumental importance.

I sense some sort of nobility...<sp:5:0:0>
A swordsman serving a princess.

And you use your power to crush the
weak... To serve evil.
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I can see it...


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I can see it!


You there! <sp:5:0:0>I... <sp:5:0:0>I see the shadow of DEATH
upon your face!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Me? I'm a fashion fortune teller.<sp:5:1:0> Please,
allow me give you a reading.
talk_1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Hee-hee! See? My fortune-telling never
fails! If you want to repay me, I'll take...
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>My, what a delightfully fashionable outfit!
I'm wearing mine underneath all this!

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Sadly, I'm afraid we have to keep our Yiga
Clan affiliation secret...

You'll have to go change.
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Now, if I may be so bold... Looking at
your outfit... Yes. Yes, I see.<sp:5:1:0>
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>There's no denying your spectacular
fashion sense...

But we have to keep mum about the fact
we're in the Yiga Clan!

I'm sorry, but you'll have to change.
talk_1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>It's not like I was going to charge you.
I simply must give you a reading!
